post_content:
I'd like to find a T206 George Davis that is well centered with vibrant color.  I'm not too picky about the rest as long as it presents well.  Polar Bear would be amazing, but I'm not looking for any particular back.

Thanks,

Jeremy
I think it’ll be pretty tough to find Polar Bear back.

[quote name="eliotdeutsch" post=2246811]I think it’ll be pretty tough to find Polar Bear back.[/QUOTE]

For sure.  I'm not too particular on the back as long as the front is centered and presents well.

I have this one available, Jeremy. 
$SOLD shipped bmwt via PP G&S.
Let me know if interested. 

Thanks,
Chuck

[quote name="eliotdeutsch" post=2246811]I think it’ll be pretty tough to find Polar Bear back.[/QUOTE]

[quote name="Rad_Hazard" post=2246815]For sure.  I'm not too particular on the back as long as the front is centered and presents well.[/QUOTE]

I think what Eliot was trying to say is that the Davis is a Polar Bear NO PRINT (meaning it was not printed with the Polar Bear back). :)

The only backs that his card are known to have been printed with are:  Piedmont 150 & 350, Sovereign 150, Sweet Cap 150 Factory 25, 30 & 649 Overprint, Sweet Cap 350 Factory 25 & 30, EPDG, Old Mill, and Brown Hindu.

Good luck with your search!
